body: I like stuff like this and before I clicked on this I saw there where like 8 others so I have a feeling that that asshole from the beginning is gonna do some shit but that’s just a hunch based on other Korean stuff I’ve read like this I hope he don’t tho

I don't like these types of Manhwa's where the sex scenes are from the characters imagination and then they "wake up" everythings back to normal. It's strange, but I only fuck with the real thing. Also, I wonder how MC will end up having sex with the Mom. If she's drunk and he takes advantage that's weak and shows lack of imagination on Author's part.
This is so amazing and freaking hot! I'm waiting for more.
